DOC.brief_summary: The hypothesis of this study is that a chronic program of physical strength training, associates to effects of low level laser therapy (LLLT) can, possibly, provide changes in genic expression of muscle and to promote an enhancement of anaerobic muscle performance in humans.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Effects of Low Level Laser Therapy in the Physical Training and the Muscle Responses in Humans.
DOC.criteria: healthy young male volunteers; nonathletic physical activity; Body Mass Index (BMI) under 26; no prescription medicine or dietary supplement use (such as muscle mass builders. metabolic disease; joint, bone and muscles of lower limbs with any disease
